snippet.title: Sonic 2 HD Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The World Premiere of Sonic 2 HD - An unofficial fan remake of the 1992 SEGA Genesis/Mega Drive classic Sonic The Hedgehog 2.

For latest demos and wallpapers, visit us at:
http://sonic2hd.com

Follow us on our developer blog-
http://sonic2hd.blogspot.com

Find us on Facebook! -
http://www.facebook.com/sonic2hd

Special thanks to Sonic Retro for the generous hosting.
http://sonicretro.org/
